			StaticText 'I would like to request adding a dark mode option to TrafficMonitor. Many users prefer dark themes for their applications, especially when using computers at night or in low-light environments. A dark mode would reduce eye strain and make the application more accessible.'

			StaticText 'Suggested implementation:'

				StaticText 'Ensure all UI elements have appropriate dark mode colors'
			[590] listitem ''

step_data.thought: Looking at the current page, I can see that I have successfully created a new issue titled 'Feature request: Add dark mode support'. The issue has been assigned #1564 and shows as 'Open'. I can see all the content I added in the description, including the suggested implementation points. The page shows that the issue was created 'just now' by 'Byte Blaze'. This confirms that the issue creation was successful. Since I have completed the goal of creating a new issue, I should inform the user of the successful completion.
